EmailTemplate.name: More Info needed on ticket
EmailTemplate.subject: More Information needed on your ticket {!Case.CaseNumber}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.CreatedBy},
We required more information regarding your case to process your request.
Kindly provide it in the ticket comment section.
Ticket Reference Number: - {!Case.CaseNumber}
Click Here to View the ticket details..
Thanks, KA POC Team
